data.eml:eml: New and little known Limacodidae (Lepidoptera) from Xizang, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pan, Zhaohui, Wu, Chunsheng (2015): New and little known Limacodidae (Lepidoptera) from Xizang, China. Zootaxa 3999 (3): 393-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3999.3.4
